thread.title: Family Friendly, Well Located Hotel
thread.title_full: Family Friendly, Well Located Hotel - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Robby G
title: Family Friendly, Well Located Hotel
text:
The Crowne Plaza is in a great location in Kensington near several restaurants and the Gloucester Road tube station. However, it is not very loud and is a reasonable walk to Kensington Gardens. Room had no dresser and very small closet. Gave 2 free waters per day, a nice added benefit. Make sure to ask for a quiet room overlooking the gardens, much better than looking over the main road. Considering the reasonable price of the hotel, I would definitely recommend.
Room Tip: Rooms overlooking garden are quieter See more room tips
